name: Ponder
long_description:
Ponder lets developers add an ultra realistic Voice AI agent to the bottom right corner of their websites in one line of code. 

Users can simply talk to it like with a human, for use cases such as faster onboarding, customer support, bookings, data entry or having a hands-free UX.

It can interact with your UI, call functions, scroll, navigate, basically anything that can be wrapped in a JS function.

You can also build your own UI for the voice agent using our webhooks in React SDK
one_liner: Voice Agent Infrastructure for Web Applications
